content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my lanai and watching an untypical blue sky in chicago. the past 5 days have had little chemtrail activity, so when i started to see dispersants being laid, i decide to take some photos. as i took the first photo, i noticed something else whizzing past the plane ... at a much faster speed than the plane itself. what was most interesting is that it simply looked like a round ball, but in sync with the object was an orb trailing, almost parallel to the metallic object, but not close enough to be attached to it ... it was more like the orb was closely following this object. in my vision i could see a chmetrail heading directly away from the earth, almost as if it was going towards the atmosphere at a 90 angle ... in addition, were two passenger planes, so i could tell that the ufo was not a plane, as i had actual planes to compare it too. the whole sequence lasted about 3 -  5 seconds. i tried taking a photo, but i'm not sure i caught the image. i was using a cellphone camera, and after uploading the images i was able to capture during my very shaky and frazzled encounter, i'm not certain i caught anything. what puzzles me though is that my cell phone, which typically snaps away, started to freeze, and at one point somehow took a photo of the ground ... but i only ever had the camera pointed in the sky. i know the image appeared to be, from my perspective, about the size of an aspirin sitting on the table in front of you ... but nothing of the image appears in my pic ... although all of the other planes in the sky do appear. the shape of the image is what initially caught my attention ... almost a perfect sphere, but what really got my flustered was seeing the orb trailing it. the orb is what convinced me that this is indeed a ufo. the orb was white/yellow and looked somewhat transparent/translucent. it differed in speed but maintained a cloe proximity to the ufo. i wonder if anyone else saw it. i can send in the photos that i took of it ... but i'm not certain they show anything, although image enhancement may help? the problem is that the location of the image is simply blue where i remember the ufo/sphere to have appeared. i've highlighted the images with white for the normal plane, blue for chemtrail planes and as the ufo/orb got closer, it looks like they only refelcted light, but they move across the bottom of the sun as you can see in image 3 the white and blue spots are in one position, and image for they have moved ... i need a better camera. this was my first daytime sighting ever.
content.summary: Ufo with orb trailing seen at the same time chemtrails and passenger jets were in the same airspace

content.detailedDescription: I was at the lake alliance in potterville/charlotte mi. i was in the parking lot of the disc golf and my boyfriend was talking to these people  i was in the car and i remember looking at the sky and it started doing all this weird pulsating patterns. i thought i was tripping out or had low blood sugar or my contacts needed to be washed. i looked at the man my boyfriend was talking to and next to his head i seen an object in the sky. it was very strange i went thru in my mind all the things that it could be. it was not an airplane it stayed in one spot and shifted in kind of like a square pattern, i wanted to show the people i was with but i didnt want to take my eyes off of it and when i finally did it disappeard.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was watching this strange object in the sky looked like a blimp it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
After reading the report of a sighting over saskatoon that took place a few nights ago i decided to do some sky watching at night. i have seen many objects and have acquired photos & video but only in daylight but the previous report caught my interest.
i went out to my back yard at about 11:00 p.M. although it was overcast with a fairly low layer of clouds i immediately noticed a star like object sitting stationary almost directly above me. right away i began looking for any visable stars and not any were visable. in my opinion this object was beneath the cloud cover. i kept watching and it slowly just faded into nothing. thinking well that was interesting, i started checking out other areas of the sky. as soon as my eyes returned to same area where the starlike object was, a much larger object was slowing travelling from west to east. it was very eerie as it was glowing inside the cloud cover, no blinking lights, absolutely no sound and gradually travelled over the peak of my house, i ran out to the front of the house thinking i would again see it, but nothing. a very interesting sighting.
content.summary: Yes, something is happening over saskatoon, from starlike to large moving object

content.detailedDescription:
Sometime in the middle of the night last night, i woke up and was just lying on my right side staring at the wall and there was a quick flash of dim, greenish white light that came up from the floor, which was hidden from my view. ���i then got a glimpse of the top edge of what looked like an amoeba-like, semi-transparent creature,  ���i quickly lowered my head and the creature was hidden from my view but there were furious energy waves coming up in that corner of the room. the waves looked a lot like the ones you see over the highway, when driving in the desert on a hot day. ���i decided to take a good look so i popped up onto my right elbow, very quickly, and got a good face-to-face look at the entire being--for just a second--and then it disappeared and there was a slight rustling of two or three of the vertical blinds that cover the sliding doors which open onto the patio. i got a good look at the blinds swing a few times right after they made a tiny clattering noise. ���it all happened in probably two seconds: ���
*rise up and look,���
*disappear,���
*clatter,���
*swinging blinds.���
incidentally the sliding glass door was securely fastened, so if the disturbance in the blinds was caused by the being's exit, it went through the glass like it wasn't there. ���today there is no damage to the glass.

appearance:
��� ���flat, like a fried egg without the yolk in the center. rectangular, but with a wavy border--again like a fried egg sometimes looks. the border is thicker, like on a pizza. the size is approximately 12" wide and 18" tall. ���it had visible objects scattered randomly inside it, sort of reminiscent of vacuoles in a cell. ���the objects ranged from 3/4" to 1" and were whitish to dark green--but���diffuse, since the creature was translucent, not fully transparent. ���the inside area of the being was dimly lit almost like the light a night-light puts out. ���my opinion is that everything of the creature that was visible was seen by light emanating from the being itself--this theory is based on the fact that as soon as the creature disappeared that corner of the room was nearly pitch black.

my conclusions:
	���	��� ���these creatures seem to have the ability to switch their bodies from matter into pure energy or spirit, instantaneously and at will.
	���	��� ���they don't seem to have any malicious agenda because i have had hundreds of similar occurrences since 2010 and have never suffered anything other than jangled nerves a few times.
	���	��� ��� i need to re-think my earlier conclusion that the many nighttime visits i have experienced were merely holographic projections and there was no physical component to them. ���one might make a wild hypothesis that creatures such as last-night's visitor are the ones who are projecting the holographic-like images. ���
	���	��� ���i am convinced that there is a connection between these light shows and the ufo presence, since, on two different nights, ���i have seen multiple triangular craft hovering high above my apartment building during a series of these nighttime visits.
	���	��� ���i have no conclusion on why i can detect the same kind of energy waves, described above, emanating from my finger tips--to one degree or another--at any time of the day or night. ���the most logical theory would be that everyone has the same energy but that these visitors have given me something that allows me to see it. ���but logic seems to go out the window when dealing with these matters. ��� (sorry, mr. spock.) ������
content.summary: Awoke to find translucent glowing object by bed.  when it saw me it disappeared through the vertical blinds leaving a couple of them swinging.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my front porch looking east just after 11 pm on june 5, 2012, when i noticed a line of horizontal lights close together just above the horizon. i thought it was aircraft at first. but then a second line of lights rose just above the first line, moved slightly to the left, tilted slightly down to the left, and started shaking up and down.  

i ran inside and got my camcorder but by the time i started shooting the objects had apparently turned into a flashing orb hovering in the same location. the orb itself never appeared to move and eventually just faded away. the whole event lasted for maybe 2 minutes.

it all happened in the same spot in the sky. it was hovering 1/2 mile south of ray road and somewhere east of alma school road, though it's hard to tell how far away it was. it was a clear night, the moon was bright and just past full, and was located about 15 degrees to the south and about 5 degrees above the object. the camcorder has a hard drive so the original video is still on it.

i've never witnessed anything unusual like this in the sky prior to this.
content.summary: Saw a flashing orb hovering above the treeline in the distance.

content.detailedDescription: Outside on sidewalk waiting for ride to work.  noticed a white faintly glowing object moving almost due north, way up in the sky immediately thought airplane, but it was moving too fast for a jet at that altitude.  the object moved behind a cloud after watching for about 10 sec.  about 3 seconds later the object reversed course and doubled back going due south, following same path.  i watched it for about 15 sec. more and it passed behind clouds.  i did not see it again.
content.summary: Whitish object very high moving fast

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was filming city from hill top when i spotted a bright light that flashed. i thought it was my eyes playing tricks on me, but the light did not go away. it hovered over (l.A.)city while these other objects passed with great speed by planes and one helicopter. it was awesome! to hard to discribe in words. i was amazed,happy and excited so i kept on filming when all of a sudden they all were gone. it was later that i saw that my footage was 30 minutes long. time flys when you film-u.F.O's. you don't need to come to me. i'll go to you. interested? then call me. i have questions for you that you might be able to answer.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Circle,   Disc,   Egg,   Flash,   Oval,   Star-like,   Teardrop
content.summary: Awesome sighting!  air maneuvers are amazing!  a must see sighting!

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting took place in the same area as the sighting that i reported on may 9, 2012.  on may 9th, i was traveling alone in my vehicle... tonight (june 8, 2012) my husband was with me in the vehicle and he witnessed this sighting.

we were traveling east on m-55... we turned north on sand lake road.  about a half mile north of m-55, on sand lake road (at 10:01 pm), i looked east (out the passenger window) and saw a ball of light in the sky (60-70 degress off the horizon).  i asked my husband to "look" at what i was looking at, and he immediately pulled over to the side of the road, turned the engine off and jumped out of the vehicle.  he wanted to find out if there was any sound coming from the object. there did not seem to be any noise coming from the object, but within seconds of the engine being turned off a car coming from the other direction drove by... by the time the noise of the passing car was gone the object in the sky was further away from us and we could hear nothing coming from it.

my first impression was that it was stationary in the sky, but upon stopping (the vehicle) i relized that it was moving very slowly... it appeared to be moving away from us (heading east). it was a bright, clear, ball of light that was so very "out of place"... it was the only light in the sky...  there were no stars (or moon) visable, there was heavy cloud cover, and it had recently rained.  this object was moving below the cloud cover.  my husbands first impression was that it was a light from a radio or cell tower... but it was too high in the sky, there are no radio or cell towers in the area, and it seemed to move away from us very slowly once we had stopped the vehicle.

we both agree that the object was a solid ball of light that changed colors from dark red, to light red, to orange, to yellow, with an occassional flash of a white light... all within the solid area of the "ball".... there were no fuzzy edges... it was a crisp, round, solid ball of light...

i would describe the light changes as a random sequence of colors, not necessarily fading in and out, just a continuous color change with no pattern... it was not pulsating and the color changes did not seem to be in any squence or in any pattern, however the white light did seem to be more of a flash or strobe, and the white light was in addition to the color... the "ball" was never solid white.... 

my husband first thought it was some type of remote control plane (since he flies rc planes, this was his logicical thinking), but he was not able to hear any noise coming from the object...  and his first impression of the color changes reminded him of a chinese lantern floating in the sky... with the occassional white light being a glimpse of a flame. he then described the color changes as a bright light with a colored flag wavering in front of the light...

i must agree... "wavering" is a good way to describe the color changes.

when we first saw the object it was about the diameter of a straw (if you held a straw at arms length)...  when my husband got out of the vehicle, i rolled down the passenger window and grabbed my cell phone to take a picture... at this time the object was moving away from us (and seemed smaller)....  the photo i took shows not only the cloud cover, but also a power line just above the object.  the photo also looks as if the object has a "tail" which is not what we saw with our "eyes".....  i then got out of the vehicle, but my husband asked me to get back in so we could turn around and go back to m-55 to follow the object which seemed to be heading east.  the second he turned the vehicle around, the object vanished... we had watched the object for approximately 2 to 3 minutes   we continued back to m-55 and traveled east for a few miles hoping to see the object again, but we saw nothing....
content.summary: Large red/orange colored ball (light) hovering /moving

content.detailedDescription:
We were in the back yard of a friends house winding down our evening.

friend with view of sky behind house noticed object and we looked after he told us to.

we thought the object was a military flair then decided against it because of the location of the object.  then again when the object changed direction and quickly moved away

the object was a brilliant bright red orb that appeared to be within 1/8th of a mile from us.  the light (orb) had no flicker, no degree of change in the light intensity at all until the object changed direction.  the light changed from red to a super brilliant white with red aura.  the object appeared to be headed in our direction then paused briefly and change direction heading over the airfield of ft. hood. tx  then the object appeared to pick up speed very quickly and disappeared behind the treeline.  the object as it was approaching us was displaying a hovering type flight pattern. as it changed direction it appeared to sway slightly from left to right as it gained speed.

feeling were very objective.  being in the military and prior military we have some experience with military aircraft and military aircraft training maneuvers. we tried to debunk the possibilities of what it was and failed to do so.

the object as it sped away was lost in the tree line of the back yard of the house we were at.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Friend noticed object in sky. we turned around and noticed a bright brilliant red orb in sky

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright light in the sky not even 500ft in the air, its light was the size of a airplane but it was just 1 big ball of light & it was moving fast, i know it wasnt a airplane bc it moved in a zigzag motion as it ascended & i saw it in the air for only a few min. then in a blink of a eye it just vanished it was moving towards the ne in grand rapids, mi where i live. it was my first sighting & now i look up at the stars everynight hoping to see it again
content.summary: It was bright & it moved in a zigzag motion

content.detailedDescription:
On may 27th, at approximately 10:15pm, my 5 year old son and i were outside about to go to the store quickly. he said "look daddy, fire!" and i immediately looked all around me and didn't see anything. he said "up there!" and pointed up in the sky. i immediately saw the orangeish-redish-whiteish light, and immediately thought it was a bright, weird looking airplane flying kind of low. after looking at it for a few more seconds, i noticed 2 more of these lights, and they all formed a triangle. at first, i tried to make sense of what i was staring at - synchronized planes, helicopters, fireworks, etc. but nothing i've seen ever looked like this before. i couldn't believe what i was looking at - the lights were so bright for how far away they were, and all 3 lights were moving at the exact same speed in a triangular shape. it then it clicked that i wasn't looking at 3 different objects, but one 'transparent' triangular flying object with these bright lights at each end. i say 'transparent' because you can usually see the outline of objects flying in the sky that low, and when i focused in the middle of these three lights, it looked like every other part of the sky - no outline or anything.
i then called to my wife to come outside ('immediately!') and she ran outside and saw the same thing. we stood there, with my son, just watching this thing fly off into the distance over the horizon. it came from the north-east and headed south-west, but more south than west. the whole thing lasted about a minute or so, and i wish everyday that i would have taken a picture... i just was so lost in the moment i couldn't think of anything else!
the thing that i remember the most was the lights - their colors were so unusual and bright... imagine standing outside, seeing three 'fire-like' lights that formed a (huge) triangle, fly slowly across the sky... not something you can easily forget!!!
content.summary: 3 bright orange-ish lights synchronize (transparent triangle) heading south

content.detailedDescription: I was a kid walking down the street it was in the subdivition holiday lake estates.I looked up to the west over gulf of mexico where the fla.Powew plant is i think its teco now just a few miles away.I saw 6-9 huge huge brite beautiful different color orbs or circles spaced evenly apart they looked like plasma because they just glow no edges and they just hovered over the power plant even when the helecoptors came way undernieth them  so a bunch of mcdill pilots saw them to. i tought they were not of this world and that the helecoptors were comming to protect the power plant.Ilooked around to find someone to show to. as i remember i didnt see them leave or maybe i went to show my mom and they were gone i honestly dont remember the last part but ill always remember what i saw and they were huge about 5 times bigger than the big double bladed helecoptors thank you very much richard s sigler  i did make a drawing of this
content.summary: After dinner looked uo twards gulf of mexico over fla power 6-9 orbs glowing bright brilliant colors as high as a jet then a bunch of double bladed helecoptors came from the south undernieth  the orbs then i dont remember anymore what happened

content.detailedDescription: It was around 6 pm that i was next to my park vehicle and was looking in the direction of ne and gazing at the clear blue sky. that when i noticed the cylindrical elongated silvery shape object flying from east to west, i heard no sound , no wings,  and flying in a straight line no more the 3000-5000 ft above land. i had my cell phone with me which has a 5 mega pixel and took several pictures. the sighting lasted for about two minutes. i took about four pictures an in two of them i noticed an oval shape dark object trailing below and to the right of the original cylinder shape object. ( of note this is not the first time i seen this object before, and  flying in different directions).
content.summary: Appeared to be cylinder, silvery reflective, no wings, no contrail and no sound.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 6 pm that i was next to my park vehicle and was looking in the direction of ne and gazing at the clear blue sky. that when i noticed the cylindrical elongated silvery shape object flying from east to west, i heard no sound , no wings,  and flying in a straight line no more the 3000-5000 ft above land. i had my cell phone with me which has a 5 mega pixel and took several pictures. the sighting lasted for about two minutes. i took about four pictures an in two of them i noticed an oval shape dark object trailing below and to the right of the original cylinder shape object. ( of note this is not the first time i seen this object before, and  flying in different directions).
content.summary: Appeared to be cylinder, silvery reflective, no wings, no contrail and no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
My mother, a friend and i were traveling to a destination (i was 16 at the time so ya mom was driving-just got my license so...) when our cars engine sputtered a little. i being a passenger; constantly look out the windows when some one else is driving.  

we had just turned onto the road leading to my friends house when i noticed something in the distance rather large; then bam-it was right on top of us and i can assure you there was nothing in the sky before this. as we traveled about 200ft. down the road our car sputtered a little and i looked off to my right. can't say why just did and there it was. a massive triangle shaped craft, flying at tree top level. at first i thought it was a bomber; then as i looked more the shape really started to take focus. it wasn't a wing bomber and it wasn't anything made by our government or military as i had read and study such thing as a child ( i.E. thanks to my grandfathers and the boy scouts). i had seen 7 objects like it about 6 months to a year early over the woods at my house ( another report i'll file after this one). i remember being extremely excited about my mom being able to see something like i had seen. i instructed my mom to pull over in some man's drive way and got out of the car. we watched as the craft moved ever so slowly (at treetop level) across the road over this guys house and us. it was moving in an north-northwesternly direction. it was about 30-40 ft off the ground maybe a little more. no birds chirped no grass hopper sang. there was only silence and this beast of a ship passing over head. i was amazed. to my chagrin i recall running and knocking on this strangers door but no one was home ( lol the driveway was empty). as it passed over the house and over some open land my friend said we should be moving on and so we moved on. i hope this helps and thanks for the site. and a big thanks to pappyog! nice to be able to get this off my chest...So to speak.
content.summary: Black triangle shaped craft. flying at tree top level, making no sound. witnessed by two other people besides myself.

content.detailedDescription:
I was tending to a fire and was heading into the house i happened to look up into the sw sky and noticed this bright white light.
at first i thought it was a plane and when i did not hear any noise as it went over head, i thought it was a satellite but it moved way to fast.
it stayed in a straight path moving from the sw to the ne.
i was not sure at first what i saw but it was not a satellite, airplane or meteor. i was excited and called my son out to see it but he did not make it time. my wife did see this object. the object finally flew behind the trees. this all took place in less than 30 seconds.
content.summary: Bright white light. moving sw-ne and went right overhead no noise.

content.detailedDescription: appeared out of no where and quickly disappeared.
content.summary: Flying north towards kansas city, mo

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the front yard and playing with the dog.  i saw a bright light, which caught my eye because it was moving and was a pinkish red color.  it was partially obscured by a tree in the yard.  it was moving from the northeast to the southwest.  when it emerged from behind the tree, i looked at it for a second trying to figure out what it was.  it made absolutely no sound and was moving at a constant speed, too low for an airplane, plus it was shaped like a football with rounded ends.  it wasn't moving nearly as fast as an airplane or helicopter would be at the altitude and distance from which i observed it but it was going much faster than a blimp would have been able to go.  i ran down the west side of the house to our backdoor to get my wife to see it.  by the time i reached the back door it was passing over the tree line on the west side of our house but you could still see it through the trees every now and then.  by the time my wife got out there and we ran to the tree line to watch it, it was already several miles away but still visible, still pulsating and still on the same straight line course.

my wife went back in and i went to put up the dog.  about 15 mins. after the first one went over a second one came over flying the exact same flight path but higher in altitude.  this one looked more star shape and rounder than the first,but was the same pulsating color.  i got my wife and we both watched this one as it crossed over the back yard and disappeared over the western treeline.  we both had a really good look at the second one.  it was on the exact directional path as the first on only higher in altitude.  it was also silent,too low for an aircraft, also no blinking lights, and also at the same rate of speed.  there was no wind, no clouds and the moon wasn't up yet.
content.summary: 1st one was a glowing bright redish pink oval light. the 2nd one was more red and more star shaped but the same size.                                                                                    -ish light slowly moving on path north to southwest

content.detailedDescription:
Location: apt balcony
witness: air vehicle with no noise but big object for being low.
common vehicle in area: seen many planes landing path to orlando int and personal
ariplane landing in near lake. vehicle is not fast enough for flight movement
to land or small for no noise. i have over
24 years of military service, look to me like a fast triangle blimp.
weather: low cloud and street lights.
object did not turn lights until over lake and then turn off once on sr-436.
no observible noice but the did turn off light once the turn from my direction and turn away. made a 2nd path, 2220 local time, no noise. but a single or doble propeller aircraft pass over it (1,500 to 2,000 feet) and was able to hear the noice of second aircraft. i belive it was making a test flight around the area.
content.summary: Possible test flight of a triangle aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I was out in the back yard, talking on the phone when i heard some rumbling thunder. i looked up at some very high clouds and noticed a metalic oval craft dip out of a cloud, hover for a second or two, then drift back up into a cloud. we have been having major thunderstorms on an almost daily basis for the last several weeks, and i have noticed that we have had unusual cloud cover for this area of ny state. i am not a ufo person, and this is the first time i have ever seen anything like this. when you see planes, helicopters, birds and the like, your brain tells you it's "ours", and you dismiss it. when you see something like the object i saw, you know it's not one of "ours", and i tell you, the hair on my arms stood up! the thing is, i was at work, discussing business with an associate, and nothing in any of my conversations, with anyone for the past several months, had anything to do with ufo's, or anything related to same. even as i write this, the hair on my arms wants to raise. i know i saw something either way ahead of our technology, or something very secret! from now on, i will be watching the skies!
content.summary: Oval object dropped out of cloud, hovered, then acended back into cloud
Either

content.detailedDescription:
Location: apt balcony
witness: air vehicle with no noise but big object for being low.
common vehicle in area: seen many planes landing path to orlando int and personal
ariplane landing in near lake. vehicle is not fast enough for flight movement
to land or small for no noise. i have over
24 years of military service, look to me like a fast triangle blimp.
weather: low cloud and street lights.
object did not turn lights until over lake and then turn off once on sr-436.
no observible noice but the did turn off light once the turn from my direction and turn away.
time between lights on on video to ligths turn off on photo, 15 seconds.
content.summary: Possible triangle blimp over orlando, fl

content.detailedDescription: I began looking at the sky around 9:30 last night, the sky cleared up from the rain so i left my window wide open to look at the stars. at about 10pm, i saw lights blinking towards the west, i thought it was just a plane but it was blinking like a strobe light in the same spot off in the distance for 30 minutes before i decided to take out my telescope. when i pointed it at the blinking lights, my heart literally stopped! i screamed to my boyfriend, who was also amazed by these lights, "that's a f@#%ing spacecraft, dude!" he ran to look through the telescope and was in complete agreement that it was not anything he'd ever seen before! it was a diagonal line of lights, at one end, a steady green light. at the opposite end, there was a steady orangish light - in the middle were 3 erratically blinking white lights and in between the white and orange lights were distinctly smaller red flashing lights. my boyfriend and i were quick to get outside opinions, we yelled for my roommates who were also astonished at the sights of this craft-like object. we all watched for over an hour as this craft slowly hovered from left to right and saw a single orangish orb of light which appeared to dock with this vehicle and quickly drift away. between 11:30 and 12, a large/bright white star-like object was also visible coming from that direction. we all watched as it ever-so-slightly drifted across the sky and over our house. we all ran outside to watch this light drift through the sky and slowly out of sight (northeast). as for the craft-like object, it was visible for about another 30 minutes and was drifting from side to side, which was clearly visible from the telescope and even visible with the naked eye. i was also able to record a video of the flashing lights through the telescope with my phone.
content.summary: Diagonal string of flashing lights hovering in sky - orange orb docks. star-like object drifts across sky.
